name: Italian Bird
preparation:
This cocktail is built around the comfortable confines of aged rum and Campari but then is taken into a new direction and layered with fino sherry, honey water and salt.

Add all of the ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir.

Pour into a rocks glass over ice, and garnish with pineapple sage.

*Honey water: Pour honey into equal-parts water, and shake well until no longer separated.
